about_the_game:
The town of St. Anne has fallen victim to a horrible plague! A magazine, it seems, is connected to
gruesome deaths that have been piling up since the last full moon. On top of that, rumors are
circulating, claiming that creatures have been seen lurking in the graveyards at night. As Dr. Hack, the
local coroner, your mission is to embark on a deadly quest to find the source of Morgue Rot Magazine
and bring the nightmare to an end. Explore the town of St. Anne and uncover the mystery as you speak
with residents and gather experience. But be warned! Danger awaits around every corner!

AND MORE!

content_descriptors.notes: The game is fictional but does depict scenes of graphic violence and death, murder, blood and some textual gore. Viewer discretion advised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 / OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 Display

short_description: Inspired from the METAL Magazine! The Coroner's Quest is a horror RPG influenced by metal for metal-heads! Play as the coroner and uncover some gruesome events which lead you on a path to putting a stop to the ultimate evil and saving the town of St. Anne. If you can stop the MORGUE ROT!!
